1133735803807518720.text: This bipartisan Secure Rural Schools (SRS) program legislation @RonWyden, @SenatorRisch, @SenJeffMerkley and I introduced will provide funding needed for schools, road maintenance, law enforcement and other essential services.

1133735802989625344.text: It's time to create a permanent, lasting program for Idaho counties and schools surrounded by tax-exempt federal forests.
